name: KvaGram the Questduck
text: Well.. it looks like you have gotten yourself lost, friend. Maybe you typed in the wrong passkey, or maybe you just opened this program, and this is a huge suprise to you. So why don't you hit that 'Go to Location' button up there in the corner, and try again?

name: KvaGram the Questduck
text: ...Go on. I don't know why you are still here. There really isen't anything for you to do here.
